meanings.definition: The quality of being extraordinary or exceptional.
meanings.sent1: Her extraordinariness in solving complex problems amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The extraordinariness of the sunset took our breath away.
meanings.sent3: The cat's extraordinariness in catching mice made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His extraordinariness on the basketball court was like watching a magician at work.
meanings.sent5: The extraordinariness of the diamond's sparkle was unmatched by any other gem.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being remarkable or unusual.
meanings.sent1: The extraordinariness of the situation left us all speechless.
meanings.sent2: We were all struck by the extraordinariness of the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The extraordinariness of the dog's ability to balance on a ball was both impressive and hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The extraordinariness of her singing voice was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The extraordinariness of the snowstorm transformed the town into a winter wonderland.
